text: The following statements are about anxiety disorders. Please indicate how strongly you personally agree or disagree with each statement.
An anxiety disorder is not a real medical illness
Answers: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree or disagree|Agree| Strongly agree

text: An anxiety disorder is a sign of personal weakness
Answers: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree or disagree|Agree| Strongly agree

text: People with an anxiety disorder could snap out of it if they wanted to
Answers: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree or disagree|Agree| Strongly agree

text: People with an anxiety disorder should be ashamed of themselves
Answers: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree or disagree|Agree| Strongly agree

text: People with an anxiety disorder do not make suitable employees
Answers: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree or disagree|Agree| Strongly agree

text: People with an anxiety disorder are unstable
Answers: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree or disagree|Agree| Strongly agree

text: People with an anxiety disorder are to blame for their own problem
Answers: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree or disagree|Agree| Strongly agree

text: People with an anxiety disorder are just lazy
Answers: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree or disagree|Agree| Strongly agree

text: People with an anxiety disorder are a danger to others
Answers: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree or disagree|Agree| Strongly agree

text: People with an anxiety disorder are self-centred
Answers: Strongly disagree|Disagree|Neither agree or disagree|Agree| Strongly agree
